teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that â€œIt is against Kivaâ€™s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.â€

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: LEARNING THROUGH MICRO-LENDING!
teams.loan_because:
WE LOVE HUMANITY, FREEDOM & INNOVATION! We enjoy learning about money, credit and economics through the process of helping entrepreneurs around the World who are unable to qualify for commercial lending to help themselves.  

WE BELIEVE that small family businesses are the #1 driver of emerging economies, jobs, and improved quality of life around the globe. JOIN US TO HELP ALLEVIATE POVERTY FOR THE PRICE OF A FEW LATTES and please invite your friends to join too!
teams.description:
OUR TEAM is about learning economics and small business skills through the amazing adventure of loaning real people small sums of money in the real world (non-profit).

INSPIRED BY CHILDREN of our clients, ages of our participants range from toddlers to grandparents.  We share a common interest -learning about economics in a real-life classroom, while helping to provide a critical service banks are unwilling to fill. (Did you know, Kiva's near 100% loan payback rate is one that commercial banks can only dream of?)  JOIN US! 
 
**Important: Joining our team "Learning Through Micro-lending helps us reach our collective goals for giving by allowing us to count your good work towards our group goals.

YOU WILL ALWAYS retain your own Kiva passwords and identity, and you can join other groups if you like as well! (please note: if for some reason your name shows as "anonymous" we reserve the right to verify that you are a real person/s via Kiva Identitycheck and other accepted methods)  

THANKS, and lets help make the World a better place by helping people to help themselves!

teams.name: 101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money
teams.loan_because:
We believe:

1. We LEARN

2. We EARN

3. We RETURN
teams.description:
"101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money", The Secrets About Money That You Don't Learn in School a 10-CD Educational Audio Program.

A portion of the proceeds from each sale will be tithed through Kiva for the sake of alleviating poverty across this beautiful planet.

"101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money" is a real-world study of amazing young entrepreneurs from ages 6-18 who acted on an idea and are now earning a few dollars to thousands of dollars every month.

These kids will teach YOU how to act on an opportunity and fill a need to create a viable. profit-making business.

At school, your children learn many valuable concepts, yet they are rarely taught anything about finances and how to set up a business that could pay for their tuition of their college or university education.

Schools teach children how to work hard for money. Are you ready to teach your kids how to have money work hard for them and not be dependent on a pension, the government or someone else to take care of them later in life?

Give your children the financial head start necessary to thrive in today's fast paced and changing world.

"I will recommend this program to every kid I can. It is the up and coming kids who are our future leaders and entrepreneurs."
- Bill Bartmann, National Entrepreneur of the Year, http://www.BillBartmann.com

"This is the perfect resource for any kid who wants to ignite their entrepreneurial spirit."
- Lu An Mitchell, Canada's #1 Female Entrepreneur, Motivational Speaker & Philanthropist,

As members of one of the most
significant organizations for women,
Chi Omega women are active 
participants â€“ not only on our
campuses, but also in our communities. Chi Omega women worldwide engage in community service. Helping and serving those around us reflects one of our highest ideals.
teams.description:
As the Ladies of Chi Omega, we represent and live by the words of our symphony:

"To live constantly above snobbery of word or deed; to place scholarship before social obligations and character before appearances; to be, in the best sense, democratic rather than 'exclusive', and lovable rather than 'popular'; to work earnestly, to speak kindly, to act sincerely, to choose thoughtfully that course which occasion and conscience demand; to be womanly always; to be discouraged never; in a word, to be loyal under any and all circumstances to my Fraternity and her highest teachings and to have her welfare ever at heart that she may be a symphony of high purpose and helpfulness in which there is no discordant note."

teams.name: Brave New Workshop Creative Outreach
teams.loan_because: We understand the power of small business and want to contribute to sustainable global prosperity.
teams.description:
We are the nationâ€™s oldest satirical comedy theater and weâ€™ve been performing original satirical sketch comedy and improvisation since 1958â€”longer than any other theatre in the United States. In fact, our founder, Dudley Riggs, is one of the people credited with the invention of modern comedic improvisation. And he started performing it before Hawaii and Alaska could even be bothered to become states.

Today, the Brave New Workshop Creative Outreach, led by John Sweeney, uses the positive aspects of the improvisation to transform businesses around the world. We tap into the same talent pool that have practiced, honed and perfected their skills on the Brave New Workshop stage and use them (like the actor slaves they are) to perform a variety of services including business training, humorous keynote speeches and scripted comedy. All because we truly believe that the principles of improvisation are, at their core, one of the greatest gifts we can pass along to help others improve their lives.

teams.name: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Libertarian Team
teams.loan_because: As libertarians, we favor voluntary charity over government force to bring about positive change.
teams.description: The libertarian philosophy is one of personal and economic freedom.  We advocate charity and free-markets over government coercion and force.

teams.name: Libertarians
teams.loan_because: Economic prosperity is achieved not through mere employment or possession of goods, but through production. The best possible means of ending poverty is through increasing wealth by enabling production and encouraging voluntary trade around the world. There are few better means of achieving this than through micro-lending.
teams.description: We embrace individual liberty and support collective prosperity through mutually-beneficial voluntary trade.

teams.name: Kiva Linkedin

teams.description:

teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Culture Detox
teams.loan_because: we are grateful for the many privileges we enjoy in North America and want to empower the working poor to better their material circumstances and the communities they live in.  We also recognize that we live in a society that is focused on stuff.  We are constantly bombarded with messages telling us that our lives would be better if we had more stuff.  Culture Detox is about consciously choosing to reject this ideology; to give instead of spending.  It is about recognizing that using our resources to help the poor is one of the things Jesus would have us do on this earth.

teams.name: Virginia Tech
teams.loan_because: "Ut Prosim" - That I May Serve.  This is the motto of the university, and it is something that students/alumni come to understand as a dedication to service--a duty to think beyond oneself.  Kiva is a way that we show we're truly "Hokie Proud."
teams.description: Founded in 1872 as a land-grant college named Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College, Virginia Tech is now a comprehensive, innovative research university with the largest full-time student population in Virginia.  The Kiva team is made up of students, faculty, alumni, and fans of this great school!

teams.name: CCBWN
teams.loan_because: We see the value and the endless benefits involved in lending a hand rather than simply providing a hand-out.
teams.description:
A group of Local Business Women working to achieve common objectives...
1. To facilitate networking with like-minded women
2. To encourage, nurture and support the ideals and goals of women. 
3. To provide a voice for Business Women.
4. To promote growth, personally and professionally, within our community (and beyond).
5. To foster the development of new business initiatives for women.
6. To enrich the lives of women through leadership.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.
